As the alleged activities were going on ,  Israel was lobbying to be placed on the short list of countries ( 38 until now ) whose citizens do n't need visas to visit the US .
However , a major obstacle so far was Israel 's discriminatory and oftentimes harsh treatment of Arab Americans and Palestinians who were trying to enter Israel .
In addition , the Israeli government had failed other requirements for the program .

Among those requirements were to promptly and regularly reporting lost and stolen passports , a situation of particular concern since some Iranian nationals were found to have boarded the missing Malaysia Airlines flight with stolen passports .
